title: Vidal Sassoon Pro Series 1 Inch Touch Control Digital Straightener
description: Introducing the all new Vidal Sassoon Pro 1 inch touch digital strraightener. Touch slider controls allow you to adjust the temperature setting to your exact styling preference with a touch of a finger. The temperature lock feature prevents accidental setting changes and "memorizes" previous setting. Curling Iron comes with a tourmalince, ceramic plates, high heat up to 400 F, 30 second fast heat-up, rapid heat recovery, auto off, worldwide dual voltageand professional swivel cord.
